long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PomoTimer is a minimalist Pomodoro Timer that helps you focus in your activities.

The pomodoro technique consists in:
Work Hard 25 minutes
Take a 5 minutes break
Every 4 pomodoros, take a longer 15 minutes break

https://github.com/FeGroders/pomotimer
